Articles.Content:
Kluster is still in its baby stages, so @Galacticvoyager and I need some suggestions and ideas for the mod. Right now, the system we're most focused on right now is Poait. We would like some suggestions for the system, like maybe another planets or moons for Savaos. Suggestions for other stars and other things in the mod (easter eggs, extra features, etc.) are welcome too.

WANT TO SEE THIS MOD'S DEVELOPMENT?

Kluster Development Thread

Two galaxies are going to require a LOT of stars and planets. Are you guys sure you want to do all that work? Depending on your own standards of quality and available time, it could take years for your mod to actually start looking like your vision. Add the fact that there's multiple "other star systems" mods already existing and the target demographic is fairly small to begin with, you should probably ask yourself if it's worth all that effort.

@Sigma88 I think had a much better idea about how to approach the issue of populating many star systems: he uses other, existing planet packs instead. That way he makes good use of what's already out there, including the super high quality stuff like Outer Planets Mod, while still leaving himself open the option of adding stuff himself.

Why not do something similar, or even cooperate? if both parties are willing, of course.

It can be a great way to revive dead star packs like all three Kerbal Galaxies (yes, there were three), Asteria, and Supernova Pulsar's three solar systems.

tears of sadness.
I would absolutely love a tight asteroid belt, but it would be impossible around even the smallest star. How about... around a planet? Like a ring system with actual particles!
THAT is a interesting idea, as long as the particles spawn in certain areas, and when the ship approaches the ring, then thats good!

Here's an idea, What if you made a small cluster of asteroids, Basically make a central asteroid with negligible gravity and surround it with more asteroids, Then make their orbit trails disappear using "cameraSmaRatioBounds = 0 0" Insert that into the orbit section of the config file. The benefit of the asteroid cluster would be lots of resources within easy range of each other.

Hey Protojeb!

 

I have seen your Kluster project and it really interests me, you have some great ideas that i would love to play with! But looking at it, the mod that you're creating is going to take a long time... Because lets face it, creating galaxies is no easy job! so instead of just pushing you along i would like to get in on the action and help you guys out on the project! hopefully getting an earlier release  If you want me to help please do call me out because i would be happy to help you with whatever you need, whether it be modelling or writing the configs, i have some experience with this stuff, me and my friend created a small game using unity. I did the artwork/ modelling, and did a bit of the wiring.  

 

 

Kind regards,
